formula: a(n) ~ (n-1)! * (-1)^(n+1) / r^n, where r = 0.678886646361824692174613333109767742222867349... is the root of the equation cosh(r)*tan(r) = 1. - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jan 24 2015
mathematica: Log[ 1+Tan[ x ]*Cosh[ x ]]CoefficientList[Series[Log[1 + Cosh[x]*Tan[x]], {x, 0, 20}], x] * Range[0, 20]! (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jan 24 2015 *)
